title: Mathieu Van Der Poel Crushes Competition in Cyclocross World Cup Finale, Lucinda Brand Batters Rivals
content:
World champion simply unstoppable in GP Adrie van der Poel race, while Lucinda Brand follows series win with clear victory in women's event.

Read the full article at Mathieu Van Der Poel Crushes Competition in Cyclocross World Cup Finale, Lucinda Brand Batters Rivals on Velo.
author: sstokes
